recipes.title: Spicy Sausage and Bean Traybake
recipes.description: A quick and flavourful traybake with chorizo, cannellini beans, tomatoes, and a generous pinch of smoked paprika for a speedy dinner.
recipes.whyYoullLoveIt: This dish is packed with flavour and utilizes beans in a simple, punchy way, aligning with your love for Bold Beans.

recipes.title: Speedy Fish Curry
recipes.description: A fragrant and fast Thai-inspired fish curry made with coconut milk, red curry paste, fish sauce, and plenty of lime juice.
recipes.whyYoullLoveIt: This quick curry delivers the deep, complex Southeast Asian flavors you crave, reminiscent of Lara Lee's cooking.

recipes.title: Harissa Chicken Traybake
recipes.description: Chicken thighs roasted with sweet potatoes, red onion and a fiery harissa paste for a quick and satisfying one-pan meal.
recipes.whyYoullLoveIt: This easy traybake embodies Ottolenghi's love for bold Middle Eastern spices and vibrant vegetables.

recipes.title: Puttanesca with a Brazilian Twist
recipes.description: A quick puttanesca pasta with the addition of charred corn and lime zest, adding a Brazilian-inspired twist to this classic.
recipes.whyYoullLoveIt: This dish combines Italian flavors with a punchy Brazilian twist, staying true to Ixta Belfrage's Mezcla style.

recipes.title: Mushroom and Ginger Stir-Fry
recipes.sourceDetail: Inspired by Splash of Soy's style
recipes.description: A quick and flavourful stir-fry with mixed mushrooms, ginger, garlic, and a simple soy sauce-based sauce.
recipes.whyYoullLoveIt: This fast stir-fry brings those accessible Asian flavours, like those found in Splash of Soy.

recipes.title: Dishoom's Okra Fries
recipes.description: Crispy, spiced okra fries inspired by Dishoom's famous side dish, perfect as a quick and flavorful snack or side.
recipes.whyYoullLoveIt: This quick dish delivers that spiced Bombay café comfort food that Dishoom is known for.

recipes.title: Nigella's Speedy Gonzales
recipes.description: A super-fast beef chili with kidney beans, cocoa powder, and warm spices for a comforting weeknight meal.
recipes.whyYoullLoveIt: This recipe brings Nigella's indulgent and no-fuss approach to a quick chili, perfect for a midnight feast.

recipes.title: Kenji's 15-Minute Creamy Tomato Soup
recipes.description: A super quick, creamy tomato soup using canned tomatoes and baking soda for sweetness, perfected by Kenji's science-backed approach.
recipes.whyYoullLoveIt: This soup is a testament to Kenji's technique-driven recipes that deliver perfect results in minimal time.

recipes.title: Diana Henry's Lemon Chicken with Potatoes and Rosemary
recipes.sourceDetail: From the Oven to the Table, page 40
recipes.imageSearch: diana henry lemon chicken potatoes rosemary
recipes.description: Quickly roasted chicken and potatoes with lemon, rosemary and garlic for a bright and flavourful dinner.
recipes.whyYoullLoveIt: This dish provides elegant simplicity, drawing from Diana Henry's travel-inspired roasts for a sophisticated but achievable meal.

recipes.title: Bill Granger's Prawn and Chilli Linguine
recipes.description: A speedy linguine dish with prawns, chilli, garlic, and lemon, delivering bright, fresh Australian-style flavours.
recipes.whyYoullLoveIt: This dish provides bright, fresh flavours and easy Australian-style cooking, reminiscent of Bill Granger's style.

recipes.title: Ottolenghi's Cumin Roasted Carrots with Yogurt and Pistachios
recipes.imageSearch: ottolenghi cumin roasted carrots yogurt pistachios
recipes.description: Quickly roasted carrots with cumin, topped with yogurt, pistachios, and fresh herbs for a flavourful and colourful side or light meal.
recipes.whyYoullLoveIt: This dish showcases Ottolenghi's signature style: vibrant vegetables and bold Middle Eastern spices.

recipes.title: Speedy Black Bean Tacos
recipes.description: Fiery black bean tacos are a quick and easy meal, packed with flavor from chipotle peppers and a zesty lime crema.
recipes.whyYoullLoveIt: This dish is packed with flavour and utilizes beans in a simple, punchy way, aligning with your love for Bold Beans.

recipes.title: Ixta Belfrage's Quick Kimchi Fried Rice
recipes.description: A quick and flavorful kimchi fried rice with a fried egg on top, inspired by Ixta Belfrage's punchy flavors.
recipes.whyYoullLoveIt: This quick rice dish brings punchy flavors that align with Ixta Belfrage's Mezcla style.

recipes.title: Lara Lee's Nasi Goreng
recipes.description: A quick and easy Indonesian fried rice dish with chicken, shrimp, and a sweet soy sauce.
recipes.whyYoullLoveIt: This quick recipe delivers the deep, complex Southeast Asian flavors you crave, reminiscent of Lara Lee's cooking.

recipes.title: Nigella's Microwave Mug Cake
recipes.description: A quick and indulgent chocolate mug cake that can be made in the microwave in minutes.
recipes.whyYoullLoveIt: This recipe brings Nigella's indulgent and no-fuss approach to a quick treat, perfect for a midnight feast.

recipes.title: Serious Eats' Aglio e Olio
recipes.description: A classic Italian pasta dish with garlic, olive oil, red pepper flakes, and parsley, perfected by Kenji's technique-driven approach.
recipes.whyYoullLoveIt: This pasta is a testament to Kenji's technique-driven recipes that deliver perfect results in minimal time.

recipes.title: Diana Henry's Chorizo and Chickpea Stew
recipes.description: A quick and flavorful stew with chorizo, chickpeas, tomatoes, and smoked paprika.
recipes.whyYoullLoveIt: This dish provides elegant simplicity, drawing from Diana Henry's travel-inspired cuisine for a sophisticated but achievable meal.

recipes.title: Bill Granger's Ricotta Hotcakes (Quick Version)
recipes.description: A simplified version of Bill Granger's famous ricotta hotcakes, ready in minutes for a quick and indulgent weeknight treat.
recipes.whyYoullLoveIt: This dish provides bright, fresh flavours and easy Australian-style cooking, reminiscent of Bill Granger's style.

recipes.title: Ottolenghi's Quick Eggplant with Miso and Sesame
recipes.description: Quickly pan-fried eggplant glazed with a sweet and savory miso sesame sauce.
recipes.whyYoullLoveIt: This dish showcases Ottolenghi's signature style with bold and vibrant flavors on vegetables.

recipes.title: Dishoom's House Black Daal (Quick Version)
recipes.description: A simplified version of Dishoom's famous Black Daal, ready in under 30 minutes for a spiced comfort food fix.
recipes.whyYoullLoveIt: This quick dish delivers that spiced Bombay café comfort food that Dishoom is known for.
